content.prompt: Diego Vel√°zquez' Las Meninas, though influenced by Rubens' royal portraits, differs from them in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Velazquez depicted royalty as solemn and spiritual.
Velazquez created a dense allegorical narrative to portray royalty.
Velazquez provided a formal, idealized portrayal of the royal family.
Velazquez showed the royal family in candid aspects of daily life.

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
